i = 0,
l = $$$nativeWindowKeys.length;

window.__globalErrorEvents = [];
function errorEventHandler(e) {
window.__globalErrorEvents.push(e);
}
function addEvent(el, ev, fn) {
if (el) {
if (el.addEventListener) {
el.addEventListener(ev, fn);
} else if (el.attachEvent) {
el.attachEvent(ev, fn);
}
}
}
addEvent(window, 'error', errorEventHandler);
delete window.addEvent;
</script>

transition: width 0.3s cubic-bezier(0, 0.5, 0.5, 1) 0s; } .course-card-wrapper .box .body .personal-info .course-status { position: absolute; bottom: 16px; font-size: 12px; color: #999999; } <div id="j-activityRightBanner" class="ga-click" style="position:fixed;z-index:300;text-align:right;right: 16px;bottom:143px;"><div class="u-signIn-container  e-hover-source"><div class="u-signIn-txt  e-hover-source "><a class="u-signIn-txt_a49"><span class="u-signIn-txt_span50">签到</span></a>
<div class="e-hover-target left">
    <div class="e-hover-arrow left u-signIn-txt_div51"></div>
    <div class="e-hover-arrow-border left u-signIn-txt_div52"></div>
    <div class="e-hover-content"><div class="u-signIn-txt_div53" title=""><div class="f-dn u-signIn-txt_div54" title=""><span class="u-signIn-txt_span55">慕课君邀请你一起签到</span></div><div class=" u-signIn-txt_div56" title=""><span class="u-signIn-txt_span57">累计签到<em></em>天</span></div><div class="f-dn u-signIn-txt_div58" title=""><span class="u-signIn-txt_span59">坚持因为不止是对知识的渴望，还为了那个努力的自己。</span></div><div class=" u-signIn-txt_div60" title=""><span class="u-signIn-txt_span61">读书之法，在循序而渐进，熟读而精思。<br><p class="f-fr">——朱熹</p><p></p></span></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div id="j-appbanner" style="position:relative;z-index:300;" class="auto-1525866952358-parent"><div class="u-appbanner j-appbanner auto-1525866952358">        	<div class="wrap f-cb j-wrap">            	<img class="logo f-fl" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/6C21E8FAE2F95E8A964501AB5F920FC8.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=402y95&amp;quality=100">            	<a class="f-fr j-close" id="auto-id-1525866952436">                	<img class="close" src="//s.stu.126.net/res/images/ui/ui_appbanner_closebtn.png">            	</a>            	<a class="f-fr j-dl" id="auto-id-1525866952437">                	<img class="dlbtn" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/C98738F71B5E662F0239FA9D59D88011.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=285y66&amp;quality=95">            	</a>        	</div>        	<div class="tip j-tip">            	<p class="f-fl">请点击右上角按钮，选择“在Safari中打开”<br>再点击页面中的下载或打开</p>            	<img class="jt f-fr" src="//s.stu.126.net/res/images/ui/ui_appbanner_jt.png">        	</div>    	</div></div>

<div class="e-hover-arrow-border"></div>
<div class="e-hover-content">
<div class="j-nav-CateBox u-cateBox-container"><div class="u-cateNavR-container  f-cb"><!--Regular if6--><!--Regular list--><div class="cateNavR-container-f"><div class="f-fl class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188"><span class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188_span189">计算机</span></div></a></div></div><div class="cateNavR-container-f"><div class="f-fl cateNavR-container-f_div185"><a href="/category/eco-management" target="_blank" class="cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186"><div class="u-icon-eco-management target="_blank" class="cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186"><div class="u-icon-psychology cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div187"></div><div class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188"><span class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188_span189">心理学</span></div></a></div></div><div class="cateNavR-container-f"><div class="f-fl cateNavR-container-f_div185"><a href="/category/foreign-language" target="_blank" class="cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186"><div class="u-icon-foreign-language cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div187"></div><div class="f-thide <div class="u-cc-noCourse  f-dn"><span class="u-cc-noCourse_span40"><img width="120" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/DC6559B1405C22A901E4CF3CBA4CFADD.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=120y120&amp;quality=100"><p class="desc">还未教授任何课程</p><div></div></span></div>
</div></div><div class="u-nocnt" id="j-findmore" style="display:none;"><img width="120" height="120" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/95F1CCA0CBA832CE8402B8CB0003BF87.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=150y150&amp;quality=100"><p class="f-f0 tips">还未学习任何课程</p><a class="u-btn u-btn-primary u-findmore" href="/category/all" target="_self">发现新课程</a></div><div class="u-nocnt" id="j-noCourse" style="display:none;"><p class="f-f0" id="j-noCourse-txt"></p></div></div><div id="j-cnt2" style="display:none"><div class="m-hometop f-cb"><h3 class="f-fl tit">我的认证证书</h3></div><div class="m-homecourse" id="j-coursewrap2"></div><div class="u-nocnt" id="j-findmore2" style="display:none;"><p class="f-fc6">你还没有申请课程的认证证书。</p></div></div></div><div class="b-20"></div><div class="m-infomation" id="j-cnt3" style="display:none"><div class="top f-f0">已报名新学期的课程</div><div class="bottom f-cb" id="j-collects"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
<div id="j-sidebar" class="sidebar-box f-fl"><div class="u-sidebar-container"><div class="u-s-teach  f-dn ga-click" data-action="课程管理后台" data-label="/collegeAdmin/teacherPanel.htm"><a href="/collegeAdmin/teacherPanel.htm" target="_blank" class="u-s-teach_a52"><span class="u-s-teach_span53">课程管理后台</span></a></div><div class="u-s-school  ga-click"><!--Regular if3--></div><div class="u-s-latestLive"><div class="s-latestLive-i"><div class="c-recentLive-container  f-dn"><div class="c-rl-title"><span class="c-rl-title_span38">直播</span></div><div class="c-rl-live  "><!--Regular if4--></div><div class="c-rl-more  f-dn f-transition ga-click" data-action="直播点击更多"><span class="c-rl-more_span45">更多</span></div></div></div></div><div class="u-s-latestP" style="display:
